name: Google Docs
description: Create and edit Google Docs documents - read text, insert content, find and replace
author: OneClaw Team

tools.name: docs_get
tools.description: Get the full document structure of a Google Doc by its ID. Returns the complete document JSON including body, headers, footers, and metadata.

tools.name: docs_create
tools.description: Create a new empty Google Docs document with the given title. Returns the new document's ID and URL.

tools.name: docs_get_text
tools.description: Get the plain text content of a Google Doc. Extracts all text from paragraphs, stripping formatting. Useful for reading document content without structural metadata.

tools.name: docs_insert
tools.description: Insert text into a Google Doc at a specific index position. Index 1 inserts at the very beginning of the document body.

index.description: The zero-based UTF-16 code unit index to insert at (default: 1, start of document body)

tools.name: docs_delete_range
tools.description: Delete a range of content from a Google Doc by specifying start and end indices.

start_index.description: Start index of the range to delete (inclusive)

end_index.description: End index of the range to delete (exclusive)

tools.name: docs_find_replace
tools.description: Find and replace all occurrences of a text string in a Google Doc.

match_case.description: Whether the search should be case-sensitive (default: false)
